name: Caballero's Landscaping
description: Specializes in drought-tolerant and low-maintenance landscapes, including xeriscaping. They serve residential and commercial clients

name: U.S. Lawns of Plainfield
description: Offers xeriscape landscaping design and maintenance services, focusing on native plants and water conservation

name: JW Xeriscape Landscapers
description: Provides xeriscaping services in Indiana, emphasizing water-efficient landscaping methods, drought-tolerant plants, and efficient irrigation systems

name: Maximum Lawn Landscaping Service
description: Offers xeriscaping services, focusing on creating gardens with native species that require less upkeep and water. They aim to create unique and visually appealing landscapes

name: HomeAdvisor - Top-Rated Xeriscape Installations Experts
description: A platform that connects users with local landscaping and lawn service professionals, including those specializing in xeriscape installations for residential and commercial properties

name: Indiana Buddhist Center
address: Not specified, serves central Indiana and beyond
description: A center for Tibetan Buddhism, offering teachings, meditation, and community for Buddhists and those interested in learning about Dharma

name: Indiana Buddhist Temple
description: A meditation learning center founded by Venerable Thalangama Devananda, open to people of all beliefs, offering meditation and retreats

name: Dagom Geden Kunkyob Ling Buddhist Monastery
description: A Buddhist monastery in the Gelug Tradition of Tibetan Buddhism, offering Dharma teachings and introductory classes

name: Kadampa Meditation Center Indianapolis (KMC Indianapolis)
description: A nonprofit dedicated to cultivating inner peace through meditation and modern Buddhism, offering weekly classes and memberships

name: Mon Buddhist Vihara of Indianapolis
description: A Buddhist organization listed in a directory of Buddhist organizations in Indiana
